Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
GenAI can only point out grammatical errors and use its learned language pattern to advise your writing.
A teacher can efficiently and has pointed out similar mistakes but also give advice on particular issues with methodology or data used.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: teacher's was a lot more informative and tailored to my needs. advise and feedback based on the requirements of the course are also huge factors in the usefulness of the feedback.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response:
AI is just vague and based on its language model, its not my writing style so its just jarring to edit a singular sentence to what AI suggests.
Teacher advises me to change something, suggests or gives an idea on how I might approach it, and I then rewrite it in my own words.
